itunes:title: Episode 548 - DB Sports Companion Show 2/11/20 - MLB's Awful New Rule Changes
title: Episode 548 - DB Sports Companion Show 2/11/20 - MLB's Awful New Rule Changes
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the proposed rule changes in Major League Baseball, NBA All-Star Weekend, why Russell Wilson thinks he is a supermodel, how Jon Jones needs to move up to heavyweight after Saturday night's win in UFC, is now finall...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the proposed rule changes in Major League Baseball, NBA All-Star Weekend, why Russell Wilson thinks he is a supermodel, how Jon Jones needs to move up to heavyweight after Saturday night's win in UFC, is now finally the time for Pete Rose to be in the Hall Of Fame, why the Cowboys might be using Tom Brady to lower Dak Prescott's deal, and if Kawhi Leonrad should have stayed with the Toronto Raptors to win another championship.
